Package com.mway.bluerange.android.sdk.core.logging

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BeaconMessagePersistor
    A beacon message persistor saves all messages persistently that are passed to the BeaconMessagePersistor.writeMessage(com.mway.bluerange.android.sdk.core.scanning.messages.BeaconMessage). method.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BeaconMessageLog
    The log that is used by a BeaconMessageLogger to enable access to the persisently saved beacon messages.
    BeaconMessageLogger
    A beacon message logger persistently logs a stream of BeaconMessages delivered by the senders and just passes the stream to all of its receivers.
    BeaconMessagePersistorImpl
    This class is the default implementation of the BeaconMessagePersistor interface.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BeaconMessagePersistorImpl.SerializationMode  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BeaconMessagePersistor.BeaconMessageWriteFailedException
